rooms.description: Spacious living area adhering to Vastu principles with a focus on positive energy flow.
Open dining space adjoining the kitchen for ease of service and communal gatherings.
Master bedroom with ample natural light, aligned per Vastu orientation.
Child's room designed for comfort and conducive to learning environment.
Guest bedroom with a small sitting area.
Functional kitchen designed for efficiency and safety, adjacent to dining area.
Dedicated servant's quarters located at the periphery with separate access.
Central open courtyard ensuring natural ventilation and light penetration.

openings.description: Main entrance facing the south as per Vastu guidelines for prosperity.
North-facing windows in the living area and master bedroom promoting calm energy.
East-facing balcony integrated with kitchen and dining areas.
Access to the rooftop terrace for relaxation and additional outdoor space.
